Subscription.Query:
<QueryList> <!-- event for new local account created--> <Query Id="0"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4720)]]</Select> </Query>
<!-- Security Event Log cleared--> <Query Id="1"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=1102)]]</Select> </Query>
<!-- New Service Installed--> <Query Id="2"> <Select Path="System">*[System[(EventID=7045)]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Scheduled Task Registered--> <Query Id="3"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TaskScheduler/Operational">*[System[(EventID=106)]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Scheduled Task Executed--> <Query Id="4"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TaskScheduler/Operational">*[System[(EventID=200)]]</Select> </Query>
</QueryList>
